titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the probationary period applicable to appointments in the civil service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 15 - 14.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
